tut.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: the sound that you make by touching the top of your mouth with your tongue in order to show disapproval
tut.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: to express disapproval by making a tut sound
tut.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: The nurse rushed in, tutting with irritation.
tut.translation[2].definitions[0].defini: unwanted things, things of poor quality, or things that are making a place untidy
tut.translation[2].definitions[0].exampl: My phone is somewhere underneath all this tut on my desk.
tut.translation[2].definitions[1].exampl: He was talking a load of old tut about the house being haunted.
